title: Introducing: ON SAY
body:
Shrouding their true identities with slightly bizarre quotes and lengthy passages of literature, Idaho trio **ON SAY** have just stepped foot in the world with their debut release, a nine track album of sorts, titled **_Another West_**.

Opening with the beautifully sleepy lo-fi prang of _Rolla Costas Comin’_, Another West is at times uncompromising, and in truth varied in quality, yet there’s certainly highlight that showcase a vast amount of potential, be it the **Bon Iver** quality of the opener, or the pre-Reflektor **Arcade Fire** stylings of East, there’s certainly something here, hidden beneath the layers of mystic, and occasional questionable production.
